document_data.mainbody:
luiries Arborshate was a half-elven member of Company Yargo that served during the late 15 century DR.
She was the type to gather sufficient information to theorize about a situation rather than engage in reckless conjecture.
When Company Yargo soared up to the Pirates Skyhold earthmote aboard the Buccaneers Tear in the , Aluiries accompanied Captain Shil Yargo to the Market Square above the Pirate Kings Retreat hideaway. She worked with an adventurer in the companys employ to study the destruction brought down upon the ruined town, eventually attributing it to the acid breath of a black dragon.
